resources.string:
This problem offten occurs in android version 5.1 Lolipop, 6.0 marshmallow, 7.0 Nougat and some other android devices .


Solutions: 

	1-Restart your smartphone:Android Operating system will re-initialize the resources and hopefully then you will get the camera resource free for your application. You may do it multiple times until the error fixed.


2-Factory reset your device: You may need to brows the tutorials about how to Factory reset your andoid smartphone.


	3-Contact your manufacturer: If the problem presistes then the last and only option for you to contact your manufacturer.
How to use :\n\t Just write the problem statement on a blank paper and capture it through camera and its done. !Hurray
